word:
I have seen the coming in and increase of selfishness in the working of fields or the non-working of fields. What does it mean, these destitute places left unworked, and so little earnest effort made to put workers into these fields? The Lord Jesus gave His last testimony to John in Revelation: 


                                     -204- 

"Write the things which thou hast seen, and the things which are, and the things which shall be hereafter" [Revelation 1:19]. Here message after message is given.
